node.doctext:
Open to all Australian and New Zealand noders. Welcome to join are those who love the Sunburnt Country and the Land of the Long White Cloud. Also any for expats and well, for anyone wanting to be a Kiwi/Aussie, touch an Aussie/Kiwi, or taste a Kiwi/Aussie.


[{linkGroupMessages}]
node.title: bush telegraph
